name: ApplicationSettings
desc: Constraints on the apps and categories of apps a user can run on their device.

items.name: var blockedApplications: Set<Application>?
items.desc: A set of applications for the system to block.

items.name: static let blockedApplications: SettingMetadata<Set<Application>>
items.desc: A description of the setting that controls which apps a user can launch on their device.

items.name: var denyAppInstallation: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to prevent the user from installing applications.

items.name: static let denyAppInstallation: SettingMetadata<Bool>
items.desc: The metadata for the setting to prevent app installation.

items.name: var denyAppRemoval: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to prevent the user from removing applications.

items.name: static let denyAppRemoval: SettingMetadata<Bool>
items.desc: The metadata for the setting to prevent app removal.
